text: Tumhi sanga, loka ho! Mi tumha sarvankade, tya allahatarphe pathavila gelo ahe, jyaci rajya-satta samasta akasammadhye va dharatita ahe tyacyakherija konihi upasana karanyayogya nahi. Toca jivana pradana karato ani toca mrtyu deto. Yastava allahavara ani tyace paigambara asiksita nabivara imana rakha ki je allahavara ani tyacya hukumavara imana rakhatata ani tyance anusarana kara, yasathi ki tumhi satya margavara yave
